DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy fluoride varnish ( FV ) apply twice year counsel counsel alone prevent early childhood caries ( ECC ) ( tooth decay child age five ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This project prospective , randomized clinical trial ( RCT ) among initially caries-free child six month old ( primary teeth erupt ) age three two public health facility San Francisco , one serve primarily Latino one primarily Asian population . The RCT 1 ) Compared efficacy twice/year fluoride varnish ( FV ) application counsel counsel alone prevent early childhood caries ( ECC ) ; 2 ) Assessed pre-intervention salivary marker ( biologic chemical ) , behavioral demographic factor predictor ECC ; 3 ) Compared efficacy intervention sit serve different ethnic population high prevalence ECC ; 4 ) Determined salivary fluoride release profile follow exposure fluoride varnish .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Children < 44 month old Cariesfree 4 erupt maxillary incisor Residing fluoridate community ( San Francisco ) Exclusion Cleft Palate Developmental learn disability Children transient residence ( homeless , migrant , foster home ) Children another household member participate study
